articles.title: Day trading stocks to buy: Bank of Baroda to HCL Tech - Anand Rathi expert recommends three shares to buy on June 10 | Stock Market News - Mint

articles.title: India's Mangalyaan-2 Mission Aims To Land Rover, Fly Helicopter On Mars - Times Now
articles.description: India's ISRO plans Mangalyaan-2, aiming to land a rover and fly a helicopter on Mars with innovative technology like a sky crane and supersonic parachute.
